title: WTB: Beater/Low Grade of these T206
author: Michael Peich

posts.post_title: WTB: Beater/Low Grade of these T206
posts.post_content:
All--

I am looking for beater/low-grade versions of the following T206s (the uglier the better!):

Bender: port
Bernhard: SL
M. Brown: Cubs shirt
M. Brown: port
Carey: SL
Chesbro
Cicotte
Dahlen: Boston
Dahlen: Brooklyn
Doyle, Larry: throw
Doyle, Larry: batting
Evers: Cubs shirt
Howard: SL
Keeler: port
Keeler: bat
Lajoie: batting
Lipe: SL
Lobert
Lumley
Lundgren: Chicago
Magee: port
Mullaney: SL
Orth: SL
Parent
Reagan: SL
Shaughnessy: SL
Smith: Chic & Bos
Stone
Thornton: SL
Tinker: port
Tinker: hands knees
Violat: SL
Waddell: port
(I would include Cobb, but I doubt there are many beaters of those four cards!)

If you have any of these players please email me (No PMs):    [url]mpeich12@gmail.com[/url]

Please include f/b scans. Many thanks!

Cheers,
Mike

I was able to knock a few cards off my list. Thanks, Doug!

Please contact me if you have any low-grade/beaters on my want list: [url]mpeich12@gmail.com[/url].

Thanks for looking!

Cheers,
Mike
